Class Pinball

java.lang.Object
  MachineObject
      Pinball
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ball4, Ball8
public class Pinball
extends MachineObject

An object that exists in the pinball. Movement can be initiated by repeated calls to the "move" method.

Version:
23/03/2017
Author:
821148

Pinball

public Pinball(int xPos,
               int yPos,
               double xVel,
               double yVel,
               Color objectColor,
               double objectRadius,
               Machine machine)
Initiate the values of the Pinball - Inherit the Machine object but add velocity

Parameters:
xPos - The x coordinate of the pinball
yPos - The y coordinate of the pinball
xVel - The horizonal velocity of the pinball
yVel - The vertical velocity pinball
objectColor - The colour of the pinball
objectRadius - The radius of the pinball
machine - The machine the pinball is located at
